nodes.text: The Clar was an astronomical object located within the Clar system, a part of Wild Space. It was the site of the Vivab deserts, a zone of ice-swept plains. The Morellian scout Barosa Warren and Casti Tholon, his Human student at the Galactic Outdoor Survival School, had visited the Clar by 2 ABY, where they explored and charted the Vivab deserts.

The Clar was first mentioned in Alliance Intelligence Reports, a 1995 sourcebook for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Clar system, and therefore the Clar itself, in grid square I-20.
